name: MeshtasticsLoRaAPI
description:
Integration for LoRa, utilising the provided HTTP API.
For it to work, you need to specify a chatURL file once on the Host.
To do this run: 'meshtastic --set-url https://meshtastic.com/o/thegivenurl ' on the sender as well as the reciever.

aliasConfig.name: channelID
aliasConfig.label: channelID
aliasConfig.description: The Channel ID to send the POCSAG message to

aliasConfig.name: enable
aliasConfig.label: Meshtastics LoRa API
aliasConfig.description: Enable the plugin to send POCSAG messages via Meshtastics LoRa API
